nodes.bodyText: when loading to cache i would suggest to load ALL records because they are not many.
when u will load all records in one round, keep in mind to avoid SQL N+1 here

pls avoid naming things like PP_... usually we used those namings for model interceptors or callouts.
Rename it to ComponentGenerator.
HINT: usually the entity and the repository shall have the same name (ofc, repo will end with Repository).
design issue: that's implementation details because that method is not useful for the caller.

+
+	ImmutableList<AttributeCode> getSupportedAttributes();

nodes.bodyText: hardcoded things shall be declared as class constants

maybe it's by OCD :) but i would suggest to have the ComponentGeneratorParam parameters param first on last because basically there u have 2 types of params: the ones which are coming from the caller (qty, existingAttributes) and the one which is coming from API (parameters)

nodes.bodyText:
avoid throwing exception because the caller has no way to know which product has a generator and which one does not.
return ImmutableAttributeSet.EMPTY
design issue: that's implementation details because that method is not useful for the caller.

nodes.bodyText: instead of /*package*/ which is not relevant info, pls annotate those constants with @VisibleForTesting because that's the reason for making them package level
i guess u have to make it private
i think ComponentGeneratorParams (plural) would be more suggestive.

commit.message:
Add PP_ComponentGenerator and its Param

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Add IComponentGenerator and implement it

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Add first draft of the Manufacturing Component Generator

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Rough implementation - everything should mostly work

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Add Interface test for Password Generator

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Add Interceptor on after new

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Move non-essential methods from interface to Util class

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

PP_ComponentGenerator.AD_Sequence_ID is a "hidden parameter"

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>

Add autodetection for MAC Address group delimiter

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10305
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>
